item.name: sql_queryAllVehicle
item.value: SELECT v.ent_id entid, v.TRANSTYPE_CODE,v.area_code,v.vehicle_no, S.SUID,V.VID AS VID,PLATE_COLOR AS plate_color_id,M.COMMADDR AS t_identifyno,T.OEM_CODE AS oemcode,T.TMODEL_CODE,T.TID,L.maplon Lon,L.maplat Lat,L.Utc, L.Direction,L.Alarm_Code alarmcode,L.Isonline,L.Alarm_Utc alarmutc,L.gps_speed speed FROM TB_SIM M INNER JOIN TR_SERVICEUNIT S ON S.SID = M.SID INNER JOIN TB_VEHICLE V ON V.VID = S.VID INNER JOIN TB_TERMINAL T ON T.TID = S.TID inner join tr_vehicle_lasttrack L on V.Vid=L.Vid WHERE M.COMMADDR IS NOT NULL AND V.ENABLE_FLAG ='1' AND T.ENABLE_FLAG ='1'
item.comments: 初始化加载所有车辆基本信息

item.name: sql_queryVehicleByMacid
item.value: SELECT v.ent_id entid, v.TRANSTYPE_CODE,v.area_code,v.vehicle_no, S.SUID,V.VID AS VID,PLATE_COLOR AS plate_color_id,M.COMMADDR AS t_identifyno,T.OEM_CODE AS oemcode,T.TMODEL_CODE,T.TID ,0 Lon,0 Lat,0 Utc, 0 Direction,'' alarmcode,1 Isonline,0 alarmutc,0 speed FROM TB_SIM M INNER JOIN TR_SERVICEUNIT S ON S.SID = M.SID INNER JOIN TB_VEHICLE V ON V.VID = S.VID INNER JOIN TB_TERMINAL T ON T.TID = S.TID WHERE M.COMMADDR = ? AND T.OEM_CODE = ? AND V.ENABLE_FLAG ='1' AND T.ENABLE_FLAG ='1'
item.comments: 如果内存中不存在当前车辆信息，则从数据库加载

item.name: sql_queryAllOrganization
item.value: SELECT ENT_ID ENTID ,PARENT_ID,LEVEL,ENT_TYPE ENTTYPE FROM TB_ORGANIZATION START WITH PARENT_ID='-1' CONNECT BY PRIOR ENT_ID=PARENT_ID
